name: Space Force (itch) (ToxicGames1981)
description:
My first every game jam entry made for the Metroidvania Game Jam.

Best played with controller also can use keyboard and mouse.

Title Screen you must use mouse to make selections.

Know Bugs that I didn't get fixed

1. when rolling make sure you are as close to the wall as you can be before rolling under it if you pop up under the wall you will get stuck.

2. May have low frame rate issues on lower end computers.
